PAL.NAME: Microsoft Lync Server 2013 - Edge
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Performance counter thresholds for Microsoft Lync Server 2013 Edge Server.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:A/V Auth - Requests - Bad Requests Received/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of bad requests received/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of failed attempts to authenticate with the relay over UDP.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of allocate requests over UDP that exceeded the port limit.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - UDP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of packets over UDP dropped by the relay.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Authentication Failures/sec

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of failed attempts to authenticate with the relay over TCP.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of allocate requests over TCP that exceeded the port limit.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:A/V Edge - TCP Counters(*)\A/V Edge - Packets Dropped/sec

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of packets over TCP dropped by the relay.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:SIP - Peers SIP - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:SIP - Peers(*)\SIP - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:SIP - Peers(*)\SIP - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:SIP - Peers(*)\SIP - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:SIP - Peers(*)\SIP - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:SIP - Peers(*)\SIP - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)

THRESHOLD.NAME: Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only) >= 1

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The total number of connections that were dropped because the limit on number of incoming connections from a federated partner or clearinghouse was exceeded.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:SIP - Peers SIP - Sends Timed-Out/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of sends dropped because they stayed in outgoing (send) queue for too long.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:SIP - Peers SIP - Flow-controlled Connections
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of connections that are currently being flow-controlled (no socket receives are posted).

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:SIP - Protocol SIP - Incoming Requests Dropped/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of incoming requests dropped because they could not be processed (due to bad headers, insufficient routing information, server resource allocation failure).

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:SIP - Protocol SIP - Average Incoming Message Processing Time
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:SIP - Protocol\SIP - Average Incoming Message Processing Time

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:SIP - Protocol\SIP - Average Incoming Message Processing Time
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:SIP - Protocol\SIP - Average Incoming Message Processing Time

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:SIP - Protocol\SIP - Average Incoming Message Processing Time
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:SIP - Protocol\SIP - Average Incoming Message Processing Time

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The average time (in seconds) it takes to process an incoming message.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:DATAPROXY - Server Connections DATAPROXY - Current count of server connections that are throttled
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:DATAPROXY - Server Connections(*)\DATAPROXY - Current count of server connections that are throttled

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:DATAPROXY - Server Connections(*)\DATAPROXY - Current count of server connections that are throttled
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:DATAPROXY - Server Connections(*)\DATAPROXY - Current count of server connections that are throttled

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:DATAPROXY - Server Connections(*)\DATAPROXY - Current count of server connections that are throttled
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:DATAPROXY - Server Connections(*)\DATAPROXY - Current count of server connections that are throttled

THRESHOLD.NAME: Current count of server connections that are throttled >= 3

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of server connections currently that are throttled

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:DATAPROXY - Server Connections DATAPROXY - System is throttling
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This value indicates that system wide throttling is on

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:XmppFederationProxy - Streams XmppFederationProxy - Failed inbound stream establishes/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of inbound stream establishment failures/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:XmppFederationProxy - Streams XmppFederationProxy - Failed outbound stream establishes/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of outbound stream establishment failures/sec
